name: Sledgehammer
note: Remember that moves go through doors, but not walls.

firstEffect.name: Basic mode
firstEffect.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

secondEffect.name: Pulverize mode
secondEffect.description: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square, then move that target 0, 1, or 2 squares in one direction.
